website_summaries.verdict: If you want an air fryer but not another bulky appliance, this fits into your pressure cooker to air fry foods.
pros: Includes a trivet, fryer basket, recipes, user manual, tongs, and a heat resistant silicone mat
We like the glass lid, which lets you see what is cooking inside
cons: While it browns and crisps up food, it doesn't get truly "fried"

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work With Instant Pot Multi-Use Pressure Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have a real Air Fryer and I have an Instant Pot. I decided to try this lid out with my Instant Pot to see if the results would be better than my Air Fryer. I tried cooking chicken with this Mealthy lid in my Instant Pot for 15 mins at 400F. The results were horrible! Chicken was not cooked inside. In my Air Fryer the chicken would have been crispy and done by then. Beware, this Mealthy lid is not a real Air Fryer and does not produce the same results as real Air Fryers do. In my, opinion people would be better off buying a small Air Fryer for the same price as this Mealthy lid.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING pressure cooker add-on!
customer_reviews.text: Dreams do come true! I had been comparing air fryers for a while, but couldn’t justify bringing another appliance into my 800 sq’ apartment. The Crisplid fits the bill and more! SO easy to store, use, and clean, I’ve used it on a number of vegetables & it threads the needle between healthy and indulgent (what you’d expect from an air fryer!) It fits perfectly on my 6qt instant pot, which as I mentioned, may be my favorite thing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Annalise A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Add-on to Mealthy Pot
customer_reviews.text: We use our Mealthy Pot at least once a week if not more, especially now that it is so hot outside and I hate using our oven. The Crisplid was the perfect next addition for us and the added bonus of a trivet, tongs and a fryer basket made it an even better deal. Our fries turned out crispier and tasted better without the use of deep frying it in oil. It was easy to set up and use. We are all excited about trying out new healthier recipes and next time we will be trying homemade donuts for breakfast since my girls LOVE their donuts. Loving the options already! - Jen Howe
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Howe

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product and brand. I love how there air fryer is now apart of the pressure cooker and they both work together makes for seamless dinner recipe and process. This air fryer has been the talk around my office since i bring in recipe leftovers i make from it. I am happy i ordered this and i have ordered another one for a birthday gift. I highly recommend this fryer it has been a game changer in my cooking routine. SO AWESOME. Thank you Mealthy <3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make your pressure cooker an air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, blown away by this product. I own the Mealthy MultiPot and when I saw that they had a new appliance that could convert it into an air fryer, I had to try it out. So far I've made crispy chicken tenders, crispy "fried" Brussels sprouts, and I made a "naan pizza" for lunch today. I am amazed by the power behind this little device. It gets really hot so you have to be careful with it. Can't wait to try more air fryer recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Icing on the Cake
customer_reviews.text: The Crispy Lid is a great addition to an already awesome product. That fact you can make the 'cheat meals' healthier is great. Cripsy Wings and Sweet Potato Fries! As far as pricing; any other stand alone air fryer will cost between $100 and $300, so definitely added value.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Fat-Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Turned on unit and bulb blew. Not happy!!! Poor poor poor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tolita willis

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Delicious Foods!
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing thing, have been looking for a device like this that can broil items right after you pressure cook them. Tried air frying in it too, made incredible fries from the Mealthy site
customer_reviews.author: Bennett G

customer_reviews.title: Many uses...efficient and wonderful results!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new addition to my wonderful instantpot!! I’m on a strict no oil lifestyle. Was diagnosed with CAD and didn’t do the recommended triple bypass...going on 4 years following Dr Esselstyn’s protocol....feeling GREAT!! This Mealthy Crisplid has just made my eating world easier and lots more exciting. You won’t regret getting one. So far...tofu, all sorts of crisp potatoes...every style!! I’m going to roast tomatoes and red bells to add to everything. And my kitchen stays cool. Very quick cooking with little clean up. I love, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Suz108

customer_reviews.title: Its nothing more than a tiny broiler.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea where all the 2 or better star reviews are coming from... following the directions to the letter to make chips or fries, it took an hour to get soggy pe chips. The recipe calls for 10 min. Tried several different variations and still came out with soft bland foods. Do not waste your $$ on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mealthy CrispLid
customer_reviews.text: I use the CrispLid several times a week. I don’t have room for another appliance so this filled the bill. I’ve done steaks (no grill), wings, chicken legs, used it to brown the top of lasagna made in the Instant Pot, tater tots, homemade French fries and many other things. The basket is small of course-it has to fit inside the Instant Pot but it’s good for 2 of us. To clean: put basket in the bottom of the liner fill to cover the basket, sprinkle with baking soda and a small squirt of dish soap. Pressure cook 0 mins let natural pressure release and basically wipe anything off. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laura J W

customer_reviews.title: Makes good fries for one person
customer_reviews.text: It works just like it should and it is a good quality built product you'd expect from Mealthy. Keep in mind if your going to need to fry large quantities for say more than a person or 2 than it is going to take several batches because you have to cook in single layer form in the diameter of the basket that fits in your pot (not a large space). Example: It took about an hour to cook a typical bag of frozen french fries.I knew that going into it but I know some people expect miracles. We do like it,works great,great quality but be realistic on how much you want it to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Make-it-happen

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase. This does not do what it is advertised to do. It does not turn your instant pot into an air fryer. At best, it will brown the top of something.
customer_reviews.author: R. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Easy healthy meals!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my Mealthy pot! I just used it to make roasted cauliflower - it took 15 minutes & tasted delish!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Delicious Results!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Mealthy Crisplid! I had been curious about air fryers so I finally decided to get one. The Mealthy Crisplid is so easy to use with my Mealthy Multipot! I make delicious vegetables, meats of all kinds, and even entire meals in my Crisplid. Easy to use, great results with my food, and low mess product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bakhaus

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer attachment is awesome! It's really nice that we don't have to have a second appliance and it's just a lid that goes right on top of the Mealthy pressure cooker. We made sweet potato fries with it and it was so much faster than in the oven!!!
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working after two months
customer_reviews.text: Two months after buying it it just stopped working. Now it is past the deadline for a return. No option to complain or talk to the seller on line. Not a happy customer here!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beverley kempton

customer_reviews.title: Such a unique addition to the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: What better way to use my instant pot! This is such a unique addition to an already awesome product. Can't wait to use that and all my different recipes and hopefully get rid of my air fryer. I heard they're working on a deeper basket which tells me they're looking to perfect the product which I think is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Ian Aiuto

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any pressure cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!. Got rid of our other air fryer. It takes the pressure cooker up a notch. We have the 8 qt and it fits perfectly. It does not clamp to the pressure cooker, so if you have small children, you would need to be cautious about them pulling the chord. I can do a whole chicken in the pressure cooker and then switch to the CrispLid at the end and it's better than the store bought rotisserie chickens. The basket is a little small, but I noticed you can now buy a larger basket for around $15.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: No-brainer addition to kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love the CrispLid! No-brainer addition to my Mealthy MultiPot. Have been considering air fryers for a while but didn’t want to commit to another appliance in my small kitchen. This makes the Pot into an air fryer! Love it and french fries!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Space-saving alternative for the traditional air-fryer
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. Let me start by saying this is not for a large family, but for at least 3 healthy appetites it is awesome. I like that you can look at the food as it is cooking and avoid over-cooked and dry stuff. Now I can air fry without rearranging a multitude of appliances on my countertop. The Instant Pot has a place of honor on my counter and doesn't have to be moved so I can air fry. Thank you Mealthy for introducing this wonderful product, and at a price that is quite affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K.

customer_reviews.title: Crisps things up perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The Mealthy CrispLid works perfectly! First off, it's a space saver. If you have an instant pot, and also wanted an air fryer, but don't have the space for one... this is the solution. This lid will turn your instant pot into an air fryer. And one of the best parts is that the it can go up to 500 degrees! Most air fryers can't because it's made of plastic. But with your steel pot from the instant pot, you don't have to worry about any plastic melting. Having it go up that high is perfect for crispy pork belly and other delicious things that you want GBD (Golden, Brown, and Delicious!)
customer_reviews.author: envizion

customer_reviews.title: More of a broiler than fryer, use it to crisp your meals after pressure cooking
customer_reviews.text: Love mine. Its good for thin stuff like fries and chicken patties, small stuff like wings, but you shouldn't use it as the main cooking mechanism! Anything bigger than wings, pressure cook it first, then stick the air fryer on top it to finish it off without making more dirty dishes. Works great for browning a whole chicken or other large cuts of meat to get those tasty crunchy bits you don't get when pressure cooking. It saves a ton of counter top space as long as you stack it right: Instant Pot base, pressure lid upside down on top of that, silicone trivet in lid, and Crisp Lid on top.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Add-On for Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: If you own a 6 or 8 quart Instant Pot consider this accessory. I made my first meal last night. The Crisp Lid comes with recipes. I made the Bang Bang Shrimp and they were great. The Crisp Lid 'air fried' the battered shrimp perfectly. One advantage is that cooking with the Crisp Lid is healthier than a fryer, but in my opinion the time it takes to cook is really the primary advantage. The battered shrimp was prepared in 10 minutes. The shrimp looked and tasted great. I am looking forward to cooking some veggie sides this week. Instant Pot is a great product but the Mealthy Crisp Lid makes the Instant Pot better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Manchester

customer_reviews.title: Easy to air fry various foods
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st air fryer. I use it with a 8qt Instant Pot. Very easy to use and clean. I recommend searching out Instant Pot or Airfryer recipes. Its easy to modify a lot of them to work with the Crisplid. There are also a lot of recipes on the Mealthy website. I also really like the handle lift shut off safety feature. My only wish is that they would make a version for the 3qt Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.author: TruckDriver

customer_reviews.title: Preformed above and beyond expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I don't fry food, but I found a recipe that just had to try. Basically, it was a shrimp, sausage and many vegetables stir fry. It required air frying multiple batches. It was worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Loren from Maine

customer_reviews.title: Air fryer convenience without another bulky appliance
customer_reviews.text: I already have an instant pot so this addition was a no brainier. I haven't turned on my oven since I got it. I'm in Arizona, so in the summer it allows you to make everything you would make in the oven without hearing up your house. Just the perfect size for two people. Best of all I don't have to store another appliance. It's amazing how often I use it. It makes the best potatoes and fish is excellent too. It's a really healthy alternative to deep frying!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Logan

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the positive reviews it has. Unfortunately, on my 2nd use I got an error code and the heating element kept going out. Something must have broken internally because it started smelling like burnt plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to small for even one person to use.
customer_reviews.text: Air fryers are all the rage but I wouldn't recommend this one to anyone. The cook surface is way to small for even one person unless you like air frying 1 potato at a time for a small order of fries and each one taking 30 minutes with frequent turing. The actual design and use of this was not ideal either. The cord was extremely short making placement in the kitchen to use very difficult, and there are warnings not to use an extension cord. I wanted to love this but it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: vegan cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I pair it with my Mealthy pressure cooker and I have been using this non stop since ! I can literally cook anything with this top, nachos, kids nuggets and fries, fish tacos, grilled cheese. It’s amazing and my mind is blown! Love it so much, and you will too! Don’t think about it, just do it!
customer_reviews.author: Spaalla

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: So to be short and simple... JUST BUY IT. Trust me its worth it. My fam uses it 5/7 days a week and often several times a day. It so simple to fry up something or reheat pizza or make fries. And one BIG PLUS is you can SEE through it unlike many air fryers. It simple to store anywhere once cooled off and easy to clean. Safe and heats up fast. I promise youll love or I'LL give you your money back! lol
customer_reviews.author: Rell Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Fry food no mess!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got the crisplid and it’s a hit! Besides making yummy food it’s less than half the mess! I also love that I store it all together so it saves space
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: This is Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to crisp my ribs after they were cooked in the instant pot. They came out so perfectly charred. Just 4 minutes at 425 degrees. I just received it today and had to test it out. It gets high marks for the ribs. Can't wait to try it on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wichtendahl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my instant pot needed!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this thing is perfect except with all these types of things the amount you can cook is limited. It's as big as any others though. I cook a frozen steak with liquid smoke and salt. 20 min on one side and 10 min on the other. It's perfect for me. Crispy and delicious. I split a potato in half, score it apply butter and wow it's great. All so easy. I few years ago I gave everyone I knew an instant pot for Christmas. They will not have to wait until next Christmas for the crisp lid! I have no connections with any companies, u just get excited to find something made well that does as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: F.  Tombrello

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be afraid, it is easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time last night. I was a bit nervous but it was very easy to use. I made chicken in my IP and used this to brown it at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Clark

customer_reviews.title: Needs storage solutions
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this. I wanted an air fryer but my small house doesn't allow for many big appliances. I thought this was the perfect solution. Unfortunately it still takes up a lot of space because I'm still storing all of the pieces in the box it arrived in. Hopefully I'll think of a better alternative but I'll complain until then. As for the product itself. It's amazing! I've made edible brussel sprouts (usually mushy & grossly resembling troll eggs in Ernest Scared Stupid...these were much better & a little crispy), pierogis (from frozen -don't judge), fried oreos, wings, French fries, fried pickles, & browned a roast previously made in the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Turned my instant pot into an air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product reviewed on YouTube and fell in love. I love the fact that I can see through the glass lid to see what is going on. The Mealthy website has lots of recipes. I found a recipe for Salmon filets that took 10 minutes and it was amazing. This lid heats instantly and is extremely easy to use. Loved the silicone trivet to set your hot lid on, and when you open the handle the unit is designed to shut off. I have recommended this to many of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: John Roberts

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for? Order this super useful accessory for the electric pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Love my Mealthy Crisp Lid. Debated with myself for days as to whether or not I would order, but so glad I did. Increases the usefulness of my Instant Pot which is used ALL THE TIME. Loads of recipes on the web. Simple to use. Easy cleanup. Healthy cooking. No longer need my stove. Instant pot and Mealthy Crisp Lid do it all.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Gasparino

customer_reviews.title: Only cooks small amount of food at once.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this, since it wasn't too expensive compared to a full-sized air fryer. The problem is, the surface area to cook in is not very big and that's why I sent it back. I was kind of disappointed it was so small, but I should have known, since it fits over my Instant Pot. I guess if you are patient it could cook for more than one person, but didn't work at our house! Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: mackemom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Easy to use Crisper
customer_reviews.text: Quick, user friendly, use on either of my 6 qt IP's. Space/weight saver compared to the "other" all in one pot. Protection mesh over halogen/convection works gets flecks of oil...kinda hard to clean (someone suggested vinegar) which partially works. Otherwise its PERFECT. Be careful to unplug your IP first, evacuate fluids, have silicone pad on the ready, then have fun creating browned crispy recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it works great for carne asada, steak, chicken wings etc. I haven't had as much success with healthy fry subs but that's me not the machine. It does put out a lot of heat but it's so nice to "grill" inside instead of outside in the 90+ degree weather here. I have yet to try a whole chicken but based on what I've done so far I'm very pleased with the purchase and look forward to a lot more uses!
customer_reviews.author: JBWB6504 Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Mealthy Crisplid which is the reason I bought this brand. Everything I have cooked so far is wonderful and so easy and quick although cleanup is a bit much. A very well made product that does exactly what it claims. The pot is very powerful and fast to heat up, within a few minutes you have steam, I look forward to all the wonderful things I will be eating soon.
customer_reviews.author: Car guy

customer_reviews.title: Not good for large families but does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, does what it claims. Low space impact and comes with all the accessories you’ll need. I use this on my instant pot 6q. BUT! I wouldn’t suggest it for larger families! You would definitely need an air fryer.. Note: this is not like oil frying .. It gets the food Crispy, but not as brown as oil flying, baking and Broiling.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Cook "grilled" or air fried foods without a grill or air fryer.
customer_reviews.text: I like it because I can cook "grilled" or air fried foods with out a grill or air fryer. I cooked chicken breast strips/fingers/tenders--cut my own. I used the Honey Mustard Rosemary sauce recipe for coating the chicken before cooking it. The chicken cooked up tender and so delicious. Mix up double or triple the sauce if you make it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce D. Pruhs

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with limited kitchen space
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment, with limited kitchen space. I did not have enough room for a separate air-fryer even though i wanted to have one for a while. Then this unit came along and its perfect! Doesnt take much room, and adds amazing crispiness to fries which i could not get in a conventional oven. I havent tried it for many things yet but fries, wedges etc worked great. Look forward to trying some breaded recipes too. Only complaint would be that the basket is a bit small (due to the size of the instant pot). So i need to cook foods in batches.
customer_reviews.author: Tokyo Dom

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used that much, but it has done well when I have. Heats fast and it works on my Cuisinart pressure cooker, although I did have to buy a stainless steel liner because mfr. says don't use with non stick, which is what it came with. Still, better than having another complete appliance taking up space on my countertops. At least I'm using my pressure cooker now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I live in an RV and wanted a broiler. I have a microwave convection oven so I did not need another air fryer. I wanted to make crispy chicken skin, french fries, and make things golden brown and more delicious. So far this has exceeded my expectations. If this turns out to be durable then I will be ecstatic. I only had my crisplid a month but it was in love with it at first use. It completes my kitchen cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I expected a lot from this Mealthy attachment and it not only delivered, it surpassed expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two at the same time. I gave one to my daughter for her birthday just passed and the second one is for my other daughter for Christmas coming up. Only birthday Mealthy lid has been used of course so this is her review. Quite simply put, she loves it! She made lasagna in her Instant Pot then crisped up the top. She said it did the job very fast, perfectly and evenly crisped the cheese on top. She had no complaints at all and truly loves this magic lid which of course means I'm tickled pink that she is so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Items being cooked are visible through the lid
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for cooking or browning right in your pressure cooker. Able to see the cooking progress of the food while in process of cooking, without removing the lid. Saves having to transfer to a baking sheet and putting things under the broiler. If you’re serious about pressure cooking, this is a nice complement to your pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Skash00n

customer_reviews.title: Most Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Christmas gift from my hubby, and today we tried it out for the first time this evening. We made crispy breaded pork chops. I was really impressed with how easy the CrispLid is to use, and cleanup was super easy. As for the pork chops, they were done to perfection—crispy coating, juicy and tender meat, full of flavor, and the only oil needed was from my olive oil sprayer. This CrispLid is going to be of invaluable companion to my Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lee Carter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my 6qt Instant Pot! Love this attachment!
customer_reviews.author: Cristo M

customer_reviews.title: Do you like to scrub dishes after one meal? Then this is for you :(
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about this is you can see your food. Didn’t really cook food evenly. Not comparable to a real air fryer. Is annoying because you have to clean the entire inside of the installer and the metal detachable rack and stand for it! Just didn’t need three more things to wash at night.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond + Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it works perfectly with my Instant Pot. I don't need 2 appliances. I have had an instant pot for several years and didn't want to pay the high price of the Ninja to get instant pot and air fryer in one. This is the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Browns and crisps beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a new pressure cooker with a crisper lid. I saw this and decided to try it. This fit my 6 qt Instapot perfectly and gave me a beautifully golden chicken. Have roasted potatoes, Brussels sprouts and more. Love it
customer_reviews.author: GLENDA

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with overall performance and quality.
customer_reviews.text: The product performed as advertised, is very user friendly, and takes away the need for another small appliance in my kitchen. We were very pleased with the quality and taste of the foods prepared using the Mealthy lid. The only slight complaint I have is that it takes longer than most of the recipes call for to achieve the level of crispness that I prefer. Overall, I am very pleased, and would recommend this product to anyone with an Instant Pot who is also considering an air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Decker

customer_reviews.title: It caught fire the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: Well, that's basically all you need to know. I bought it in July and used it today for the first time. It ran for three or so minutes and then caught fire. The return window closed, and apparently there's no warranty either? Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Healthy frying
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, cooks quickly, but doesn't always brown as well as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying this unnecessary and impractical tool
customer_reviews.text: Lets me make roasted chicken but it's way too small for two servings of air fried sweet potatoes. I hardly use it, I can do much better buying Costco chicken. Its sweet potato fries were so yummy I bought an air fryer toaster oven so I could make enough for my husband and me. It works well but is something I hardly use.
customer_reviews.author: Married Widow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the CrispLid. I just got it and used it to cook brussel sprouts. They turned out great. Very crispy easy clean up. I will be using my instant pot more with this lid.
customer_reviews.author: DianeKostecki

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: i had a small air fryer before 2.2l and adding the crisplid was fantastic i have a instant pot 6qt fits perfectly and i luv it would recommend it for sure takes up no room at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far. Cooked pork chops few days ago and they were wonderful. Product arrived in timely fashion, excellent packaging, easy to use, the Ap is also awesome. Only used it once, can not wait to use again. Will update this review if I run into any problems. Only downside is the size but big enough for husband and self
customer_reviews.author: AZHope

customer_reviews.title: For an add on product this is great.
customer_reviews.text: Lots add on products are cheap imitations the the product they are trying to mimic. Not this guy everything we have tried in it has come out flawlessly. Wish we had not waited to get
customer_reviews.author: Ken  Kochczynski

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable tool for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love this thing. I wish I had learned about it sooner. I've been having tater tots every day and its so fast and easy. The serving size I get is just about right for my tater lovin' arse. I haven't tried anything else yet but I do plan on trying curried chickpeas at some point and maybe even French toast and air friend pb&j cheese sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: kittydorkdork

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it...
customer_reviews.text: but didn’t even like it. It was a shame because we love the Mealthy and thought this would be a great addition. It just doesn’t hold up to the Ninja. Small capacity, can’t toss fries or tots (using tongs to stir just mushes them), and it seems to cook slower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1 or 2 person households.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Works great on a 6qt Instant Pot. As a 2-person household this fits our needs perfectly, without having to buy another appliance. Very easy to use. Good construction. There is also a Mealthy App. that gives recipes specifically for the Crisplid. The only downside is that the cooking space is small, so you can’t cook much at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Two for One
customer_reviews.text: I Love the Mealthy Crip Lid, it's nice to not have another use for my Instapot. I made chicken wings the first time I used it and they came out nicely, not dried out. Next I will make smashed seasoned potatoes to see if it does just as well. Great addition for anyone with an Instapot.
customer_reviews.author: 49erbabe

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome fryer,  read precautions and take them seriously
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. However caution, really powerful and uses lots of energy it dims every light in the kitchen. Don't use an extension cord, and if you have an older house with substandard electricity and wiring you might experience issues
customer_reviews.author: Ironpelvis

customer_reviews.title: Getting a second use from my pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: I use my instant pot daily and now even more so. My only complaint about this is, it’s a challenge to keep clean. The glass comes clean with a little work, but forget about the heater housing. I’m not sure if it would be safe to use some kind of natural oven cleaner on it. Anyway the thing cooks wonderfully. I enjoy reheating food in it instead of the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Adds new function to the Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: With this I'm now able to brown up meals cooked in the Instant Pot, a really nice function to have for some things. Works well and you can use it as a small air fryer as well all though it doesn't work as well as a real air fryer. I like it and would recommend it for any die hard Instant Pot fans.
customer_reviews.author: Prop

customer_reviews.title: Love my Mealthy Crisp Lid!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my Instant Pot for a while and when I saw this on YouTube I had to have it! It does exactly what it says it does, crisps this up! I am doing KETO and this helps with items to stay healthy. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Small capacity,  slow cooking
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but not great execution. Doesn't hold very much, about one large potato. Takes longer than my other air dryer, and a few of the potatoes weren't done after 25 minutes at 400 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryln52

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: The Mealthy CrispLid works beautifully to brown and crisp food items in the electric pressure cooker. I've only used it a couple of times so far, but both times I was really happy with the results. The CrispLid is also very lightweight and easy to use and to store.
customer_reviews.author: Alison L.

customer_reviews.title: lid does not secure to pot
customer_reviews.text: browns ok but lid don't secure or lock to pot I have very large dogs & grand kids running around & they being them I worry on a safety issue on that reason do not give a good review
customer_reviews.author: judith kafer

customer_reviews.title: A 'must have' Instant Pot accessory!
customer_reviews.text: This takes you Instant Pot cooking to a new level. I am so pleased with thus tool. I love not having to heat up the oven to broil/brown dishes prepared in the IP. It is so easy to use and quickly gives your food that special, crunchy topping we love.
customer_reviews.author: Jane S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and food comes out perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I’ve bought. I’ve used it for breaded chicken breasts, made a pizza in my instant pot and it cooked it perfectly, and OMG my sweet potato fries were fantastic. Anyone that has an instant pot has to get one of these to go along with it. I’m going to be ordering another to give to my daughter for Christmas. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Doesn't work and I don't think it's a lemon - the technology is subpar. Maybe the new Instapot brand one works?
customer_reviews.author: ae

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love , love this thing! I have used it almost every day since I got it. I use it to cook toquitos, chicken nuggets, and it's great to crisp up ribs after cooking in the instant pot
customer_reviews.author: Shannon W.

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few month now. I have done potatoes, chicken, and some snacks with it. Works good. It is just me and the wife so I didn't want one of those big thing taking up counter space for something I will only use occasionally. Fit in the cabinet and is easy to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lid is very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Figuring out how to use the Mealthy lid is easy and takes very little time. I like that you can view the cooking food with the glass lid. Only thing I don't like is when making french fries. They all have to be in a single layer and the basket doesn't have much room. It's OK for two people but if you are making fries for more than two people you would have to do another batch which takes about 20 minutes. But the fries tasted good!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works just ad described, space saver!
customer_reviews.text: It really adds nice crisp to my cuisine. Works great. Does the job as promised. Just one thing - batches of food are too small, you have to do several for a family. But I am not sure how that could be improved. So 5 stars to a great helper at the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Alex T

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as advertised. Convenient and eliminates having to use separate broiler.
customer_reviews.author: norm

customer_reviews.title: Air fryer lid for instant pot.
customer_reviews.text: Live alone & have an instant pot. Didn’t want to add another large appliance to my kitchen like a stand alone air fryer. This fits on top of my instant pot & cooks enough for me. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Palma Sainsbury

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I takes a bit longer to cook using this vs using a regular air fryer, but it is MUCH easier to clean and still does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: JoyD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister-in-law who loves her instant pot. Once she received it, she started using it and raved about it so much. So I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: valuable
customer_reviews.text: A Mealthy Crisp Lid makes your pressure multicooker of any brand an all cooking one pot kitchen cooker replacing all cooking appliances where space is valuble.
customer_reviews.author: Max Man.

customer_reviews.title: Work's really well
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and does a good job. Saves space by not having two large items on the counter top. Can cook in the Instant Pot and then brown with the lid and have only one pot to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: When product arrive, the trivet and and recipe book were missing.
customer_reviews.text: When product arrive, the trivet and and recipe book were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best addition to my Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. I have an 8qt Instant Pot and this is a perfect addition. I put in my IP frozen chicken wing and a few minutes later they were crispy and so good!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to Mealthy electric pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Makes any stainless steel pot pressure cooker operate like an air fryer. Simple and convenient to use for broiling small batches of food.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Robuck

customer_reviews.title: It’s a crisper not air fryer.
customer_reviews.text: Feedback from the recipients as this was a gift: this Crisper fit their 6 qt instant pot, not like an air fryer, more like a broiler, they’re happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Makes great crispy chicken
customer_reviews.text: The lid is very easy to use with an Instant Pot. Makes crispy chicken with no oil that tastes great. Cleaning the mesh tray is a little bit of work since the drippings do not clean off easily with out a pre-soak.
customer_reviews.author: spb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 🤪
customer_reviews.text: Whereas this works just fine I'm very disappointed that a new model came out right after I bought this with a dehydration mode and a deeper basket. Would love to exchange it! Too bad for me. If you would like those features DO NOT BUY THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to avoid having to store 2 separate appliances
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this air fryer lid. We live in an RV and need to save space so we don't have room for a stand alone air fryer. This lid is perfect for us. Its capacity is great for our family but we don't eat large quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Emalea R

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: It works fantastic! I have been wanting an air fryer but didn’t want another appliance and wanted to avoid using Teflon. This fit the bill. My only question is I haven’t quite figured out how to clean it well. It wouldn’t seem it can be immersed in water. For now I have been wiping it off with hot soapy water but there are some stains that I can’t remove. Not a game changer, would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: The food I made was good as long as it was ‘thin’. Nothing that was in thick layers would cook evenly without quite a lot of attending, meaning watching, stirring, etc. I’m not feeling like a made a wise choice with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Product heat up well. Cooks a little different vs air fryer. But once you use it once or twice you got it down.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Perry

customer_reviews.title: Sooo great!
customer_reviews.text: This CrispLid is wonderful! I live in AZ and don't turn on the oven from mid-May to early October. Made 'french fries' the other night. Can roast my red peppers again. Baking little cakes. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Mealthy products.
customer_reviews.text: My third Mealthy product and I love their brand. They are quality made products and I think this one will be well worth the money. Seems to work as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love air frying in an instant pot, but not the safest option
customer_reviews.text: Great product addition to my instant pot, without another item cluttering my counter. The only flaw is that the lid does not clamp or seal onto the instant pot in anyway, so if you have children or a small kitchen, the lid could easily be knocked off and burn someone.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at this product! It fits easily over my instant pot 6 quart. I have not fried a thing in this house since I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Nanyer

product_meta.title: Mealthy CrispLid for Pressure Cooker - Turns your Pressure Cooker into an Air Fryer - Air fry, Crisp or Broil fits 6 & 8 Q Pot Basket, Trivet, Silicone Mat, Tongs plus Instant access Free Recipe App
feature_bullets: TRANSFORM YOUR PRESSURE COOKER INTO AN AIR FRYER: air fry, broil, and crisp directly in the stainless steel pot of your electric pressure cooker.
FITS 6 & 8 QUART ELECTRIC PRESSURE COOKERS: unique lid design is compatible with 6 and 8 quart stainless steel inner pots for electric pressure cookers.
WE’VE THOUGHT OF EVERYTHING: raised trivet, fryer basket, stainless steel tongs, heat-resistant silicone mat, full color recipe booklet, and full color user guide included!
WATCH YOUR FOOD COOK: Transparent tempered glass lid enables you to watch your food as it cooks.
LESS CLUTTER, EASY CLEANUP: All accessories are dishwasher-safe and 100% BPA-free. Small profile frees up counter space and reduces clutter.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,123 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
